representation_information.name: ESRI ArcInfo Grid
representation_information.description: ESRI ArcInfo Grid (ESRI_grid) is a raster file format developed by ESRI to contain information about geographic space in a grid. They are useful for representing geographic phenomena that vary continuously over space, and for performing spatial modeling and analysis of flows, trends, and surfaces such as hydrology.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
